changes.message: Important security fixes.
Security hardening: Require role check for remoting callables.
Always allow configuring agent-to-controller security subsystem.
Add XStream2 constructor matching super.
Remove deprecated, unsafe classes previously copied from Apache Ant. Docker Slaves plugin is incompatible with this change.
ExecutorListener may now be implemented as a static extension.
Update tooltips to be consistent across Jenkins.
Screen Resolution cookie now has the secure flag set when Jenkins is running on HTTPS.
Deprecate the -cp option in the remoting agent.jar command line. Upgrade from Remoting 4.10 to Remoting 4.11.
Display ongoing build in build history (regression in 2.314).

Fix agent handshake when connecting over Websocket on Java 11.
Upgrade from Remoting 4.10 to Remoting 4.11.
Reduce the amount of disk writes to logs/tasks/*.log when nothing interesting is happening.
Update the French translation in the legend.
Display full plugin name and link when a plugin fails to load.
Improve error reporting for certain kinds of bugs in computer listeners.
Update bundled versions of Pipeline: API, Pipeline: Step API, SCM API, and Structs plugins.
Developer: Fix XStream2 support of unmarshalling implicit collections.
Security fixes.
Security hardening: The "short description" of build causes is now defined as plain text instead of HTML.
Modernise the "Build History" search bar
Show new status icons in build history
Modernise the "Manage Jenkins" screen
Allow a plugin to dynamically insert a JAR file into its classpath.
Remove the --daemon argument from Jenkins command line arguments. Replace Akuma library from Jenkins core with simpler implementations using ProcessTree capabilities
Allow Jenkins to start when the JCasC configuration defines view-related permissions (regression in 2.302).
Correction of Label expression including a "implies" relationship without spaces around.
WebSocket connections now work when the Jenkins controller is running Java 11 and using self-terminated TLS.
Update executable war from 1.45 to 2.0
Replace the old icons with the new SVG icons in the job trend page.
Fix wrong parameter type for Text Parameter when triggering a build via the buildWithParameters API call.
Graphs now scale correctly on high resolution screens.

The checkbox labeled "Enable Agent â†’ Controller Access Control" in the form "Configure Global Security" would always start out as disabled. Submitting the form without checking it would then cause a configuration change (regression in 2.307).
Load classes from plugins in parallel for faster startup on multicore machines.
Internal: Experimental support for URLClassLoader can be enabled by setting hudson.ClassicPluginStrategy.useAntClassLoader=false.

node.banner: This release build failed while release uploads were blocked. Installers, native packages, and jenkins.war were not published.

changes.message: Jenkins 2.310 was not placed in the artifact repository or on the download site.

Fix missing settings/cog icon in Plugin Manager.
Fix incorrect folder icon showing in projects (regression in 2.307).
Add ABORTED threshold to ReverseBuildTrigger.
Developer: Bump Java Native Access (jna) from 5.8.0 to 5.9.0.
Internal: AntClassLoader (and its subclass PluginFirstClassLoader) and MaskingClassLoader register themselves as parallel-capable.
Upgrade from xstream 1.4.17 to 1.4.18.

Use SVGs over PNGs for the sidebar when possible. Breadcrumb bar/logo/menu items are now correctly aligned on the left together. Move old war/images folder to webapp so they can be used in frontend - the SVGs are now in the webapp/images/svgs folder.
Update appearance for feed bar and description button to be modern and consistent.

When the buildWithParameter API is called, if the requests with the same parameters in the queue are merged, the http response code of the request uses a more appropriate 303(see other) instead of 201(created).
Warn about use of master in a label expression when that's no longer in use.
Use full URL character encoding for the generated inbound agent launch string.

Use the JVM's default keystore type for the Jenkins server when terminating TLS connections within Jenkins. Used if Jenkins is started with the --httpsPort argument. Winstone 5.21: Update Jetty from 9.4.42.v20210604 to Jetty 9.4.43.v20210629.
Developer: Bump spring-security-bom from 5.5.1 to 5.5.2.

node.banner: The default Docker images for Jenkins 2.307 ('2.307', 'latest', 'alpine', 'slim', ...) use Java 11 unless specifically tagged with the jdk8 string. See the Docker images use Java 11 by default blog post for more details.

changes.message: Replace the term "master" with "controller" (for the main Jenkins application) or "built-in node" in user interface strings and documentation as appropriate.

Add migration code to change the node name (e.g. NODE_NAME environment variable) and label of the built-in node only after explicit migration by an administrator. New installations get the new node and label immediately. If a job definition, Pipeline definition, or tool installer reference must be tied to the built-in node, it should use the label "built-in".

references.title: Built-In Node Name and Label Migration

changes.message: Add the system property jenkins.model.Jenkins.nodeNameAndSelfLabelOverride to specify a different node name and label for the built-in node (e.g. for Configuration as Code use cases) than the one otherwise determined. This will not affect other uses of the node name, such as the URL to the built-in node (now /computer/(built-in)/).
GDSL file in jenkins-core library no longer reports an IllegalStateException when used in IntelliJ IDEA.
Improve layout of console output header.
Use the SVG version of the Jenkins text logo instead of the PNG.
Developer: Jenkins now uses an updated version of the AntClassLoader class with fewer custom patches.

Removed: The Woodstox implementation of the StAX API has been removed from Jenkins core.
Users of the Azure Artifact Manager, Azure Container Agents, Azure Storage, and Azure SDK API plugins must upgrade those plugins to the latest versions in lockstep with this core upgrade.
Plugins that consume Woodstox should depend on it directly or via the Jackson 2 API plugin.
Provide working "Help About" links for Jenkins CLI, Jenkins core, and Jenkins war.
Developer: AntClassloader will now ignore files that are part of the classpath but not zip files when scanning for resources. It used to throw an exception.
Show tooltips when users hover on the SVG icons.
Ability to disable Java 11 administrative monitor with a system property.
Developer: Make AntClassLoader multi-release JAR aware when it deals with java.util.jar.JarFile.
Fix an issue unzipping archives in a corner case when entries have the same path prefix as the target location.
Avoid polluting the log when usage statistics can not be sent.
Bump matrix-auth from 2.6.7 to 2.6.8.
Bump bundled Ant from 1.10.10 to 1.10.11.

Remove support for native JNR (Java Native Runtime) chmod(2) and stat(2) implementations as opposed to NIO (Java non-blocking I/O) via the hudson.Util.useNativeChmodAndMode system property. This system property no longer has any effect.
Developer: Allow consumers of XmlFile to disable fsync(2).

Internal: Terminology cleanup to fix build time trend's distributed builds.
Only show the agent column when the controller has agents defined.
Bump commons-compress from 1.20 to 1.21.
Bump spring-security-bom from 5.5.0 to 5.5.1.
Optimize access control checks affecting (at least) Pipeline node steps.
Developer: The hudson.util.SubClassGenerator and experimental hudson.model.TreeView class have been removed without replacement.
Internal: Upgrade from Remoting 4.9 to Remoting 4.10 with bugfixes and dependency updates.
Fix a regression in 2.298 where some plugins (including Azure Storage) could not correctly parse streaming XML output.
The Jenkins process management functionality now supports FreeBSD.
Bump jenkins from 1.64 to 1.65.
Winstone 5.19: Update Jetty from 9.4.41.v20210516 to Jetty 9.4.42.v20210604.
Important security fixes.
Update stapler from 1539.v2f05ce93882d to 1563.v3da2d02f9572.
Developer: InterceptingExecutorService and its subclasses no longer extend com.google.common.util.concurrent.ForwardingExecutorService or com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject.
Remove jna-posix dependency from Jenkins core. Plugins that use jna-posix functionality must be migrated from jna-posix to jnr-posix.
Document REST methods to mark an (agent) node temporarily offline and related tasks.
Add X-Frame-Options header to AJAX responses.
Remove Apache Commons Digester library and related code from the Jenkins core.
Fix incorrect process termination issues when running on macOS.
Add check to prevent out of bounds memory access error on macOS.
A race condition in class loading could result in a LinkageError.
Do not change fonts when artifacts are as shown as a tree.
Bump sshd-core from 2.5.1 to 2.7.0 in Jenkins CLI.
Fix regressions in forms submissions from unwanted form validation in any browser (regression in 2.289).
Recommend running on Java 11.
Change the word 'number' to 'integer' in the error message of the number field.
Show implied plugin dependencies or a count of dependencies for plugins split from core.
Bump spring-security-bom from 5.4.6 to 5.5.0.
Winstone 5.18: Update Jetty from 9.4.40.v20210413 to 9.4.41.v20210516 for bug fixes and enhancements.
A specific and rarely encountered internal error now again correctly shows details about the cause (regression in 2.292).
Improve contrast for the checkbox in the login page.
Jenkins redirects users to the previous page after login even if they were able to view it while not logged in (regression in 2.266).
Developer: View is now a DescriptorByNameOwner allowing its use as AncestorInPath.

Remove the Bytecode Compatibility Transformer library and related code from Jenkins core. Developer: Plugins that rely on the hudson.model.Queue$Item#id or hudson.model.AbstractProject#triggers fields must be updated to call the corresponding getters.

Developer: Remove JTidy dependency from Jenkins core.
Plugins that use JTidy functionality must be updated to explicitly declare a dependency on JTidy rather than relying on Jenkins core to provide this library.
Internal: Remove partial (~6% complete) Arabic and Portuguese translations
Internal: Upgrade from Remoting 4.8 to Remoting 4.9 with bugfixes and dependency updates.

node.banner: This release build does not include a Windows installer due to an infrastructure issue. Other installers and native packages are available for use.

changes.message: Fix SSH command line interface (CLI) authentication (regression in 2.284).
Fix NoSuchMethodError when using plugins that rely on bridge methods for compatibility (regression in 2.278).
Remove the requirement for locking the queue when adding a new node.
Explain that some plugin updates can be unavailable even on the latest version of a given release line (i.e. LTS).
Update French terminology for controller.
Upgrade from xstream 1.4.16 to 1.4.17.
Internal: Upgrade from Remoting 4.7 to Remoting 4.8 with bugfixes and dependency updates.

Allow builds to complete when using fingerprints to track items associated with the build.
Fix a regression where fingerprint facets were not removable (regression in 2.292).
Update Stapler from 1.263 to 1532.vfcf95addcb5f to improve performance when encoding unicode characters in JSON API.
Display Pipeline builds among user build history and remove incorrect warning about view build history.

Stop bundling the External Monitor Job Type, LDAP, and PAM Authentication plugins. Jenkins will no longer automatically install the External Monitor Job Type, LDAP, or PAM Authentication plugins on startup if a plugin depending on Jenkins 1.467 or earlier is discovered. If you use such a plugin that also relies on the functionality provided by the External Monitor Job Type, LDAP, or PAM Authentication plugin and manage plugins outside Jenkins' plugin manager, you will now need to ensure that a recent release of the External Monitor Job Type, LDAP, or PAM Authentication plugin is installed. Jenkins will attempt to load such plugins but may fail at any time during startup or afterwards with ClassNotFoundException or similar.
Improve build status progress animation.
Internal: Update Stapler from 1.263 to 1532.vfcf95addcb5f to remove Guava dependency.

Remove JEP-200 compatibility workarounds for releases published before February 2018 of the following plugins: Maven Integration, Job DSL, Monitoring, Git Client, Pipeline: Supporting APIs, OWASP Dependency-Check.
Improve performance for standard input of the Jenkins CLI, for example with the `install-plugin` command.
Wrap the build name in the build results list if it is too long.
Stop sending HTTP response headers related to the remoting-based CLI (removed in 2.165).
Winstone 5.17: Update Jetty from 9.4.39.v20210325 to 9.4.40.v20210413 for bug fixes and enhancements.
Fix an issue archiving files greater than 4 GiB in size when creating ZIP64 archives.
